comments.body: @soltysh @deads2k Is it preferable to take this route, and manipulate the generated object before printing.. or would it be better to, [in the generator](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubectl/blob/master/pkg/generate/versioned/service.go#L80), add the namespace to the generated object?

That code seems to be used in the ```run``` command as well.

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/8b24d1f2f92063faa4cff1cdea6a3d504597b555/staging/src/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/run/run.go#L677-L679
This is ok temporary solution, we're slowly getting rid of generators which will clear this situation.
